Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to providing an exemption for lifeguard services
Summary: Relates to providing an exemption from sales and compensating use taxes for lifeguard services provided by a qualified lifeguard or aquatic supervisory staff.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing an exemption for lifeguard services
